conversations.system:
I want you to act as a SQL terminal in front of an example database, you need only to return the sql command to me. Below is an instruction that describes a task, Write a response that appropriately completes the request.

##Instruction:
cinema contains tables such as cinema.
Table cinema has columns such as cinema_id, name, openning_year, capacity, location.
conversations.query: Show all the cinema names and opening years in descending order of opening year.
conversations.answer:
SELECT name,
       openning_year
FROM cinema
ORDER BY openning_year DESC;
